name: test_e2e_with_logs[094_XSS_REFL_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_REFL_010` |
| **Name** | Video source onerror XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | reflected_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<video><source onerror=alert('XSS')>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cvideo%3E%3Csource%20onerror%3Dalert%28%27XSS%27%29%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`

- **Latency**: ~42000ms
